content:
# The error indicates that I no longer have any coal left in my inventory to insert into the Stone Furnace. This means I need to gather more coal before I can continue smelting the Iron Ore.

# I will locate a coal resource patch and harvest some more coal.

coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Locate the nearest Coal resource
move_to(coal_position)  # Move to the Coal resource location
harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=10)  # Gather some coal from the resource patch
print(f"Inventory after gathering coal: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check current inventory after gathering more coal
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities on the map again
